power.title: Archer's Handholds
power.fluff: A line of arrows sticks to the wall where you point your bow
power.section: Requirement:You must be wielding a Bow or Crossbow.
Effect:Choose up to 5 contiguous squares of a vertical surface within your weapon range. You expend two pieces of ammunition for each square chosen.

Until the end of the encounter, the DC to climb the chosen squares is reduced by your Dexterity modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus. If the DC is reduced to less then 0, a character climbing the chosen squares automatically succeeds on the Athletics check.

power.title: Avian Grace
power.fluff: You don't know the secret of flight, but you have learned some lessons towards it
power.section: Prerequisite:You must have a raptor beast companion.
Effect:Until the end of the encounter, you are considered to have a running start whenever you make a long jump.
Also, you gain a +2 power bonus to fly speed if you have it.

power.title: Begin the Hunt
power.fluff: You quickly identify your prey and ready yourself to attack it
power.section: Trigger:You roll initiative
Effect:You gain a +2 bonus to the triggering initiative check.

After initiative has been rolled, you use your designate quarry class power against one creature you can see. You gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against that creature until it is no longer your quarry.

power.title: Bending Branch
power.fluff: You resist a foe's attempt to move you, and like a great tree swaying in a storm, you snap back, ready to attack
power.section: Trigger:You are pulled, pushed, or slid
Effect:You negate the triggering forced movement.
Also, you gain a +2 bonus to the first melee attack roll you make before the end of your next turn.

power.title: Bridge of Roots
power.fluff: The primal energy you draw from the ground calls forth a churning mass of great roots that can cover even the most dangerous ground
power.section: Effect:The burst creates a zone of massive roots until the end of the encounter. At least one square of the zone must be on a solid surface.
You and your allies can ignore difficult terrain and hindering terrain in the zone. Any portion of a pit, chasm, or similar terrain feature in the zone can be crossed safely.
While the zone remains, you can take the following action at-will:
Move Action:You move the zone up to 5 squares. At least one square of the zone must remain on a solid surface during the move.

power.title: Crucial Advice
power.fluff: You are wise in all things, making your friends safer and better off when they rely on you
power.section: Trigger:An ally within range makes a skill check using a skill with which you have training; you must be able to see and hear the ally
Effect:The triggering ally rerolls the triggering skill check with a power bonus equal to your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Entangling Roots
power.fluff: Thick roots emerge from the ground in response to your command, and your foes stumble as they try to slip through them
power.section: Effect:The burst creates a zone of winding roots until the end of the encounter.
The ground in the zone is difficult terrain for your enemies. When an enemy charges, its movement cannot include any square of the ground in the zone.

power.title: Equestrian Maneuver
power.fluff: You guide your horse through tight spaces to reach that enemy who thought it was safe
power.section: Prerequisite:You must have a horse beast companion.
Requirement:You must be mounted on your beast companion.

Effect:Until the end of your next turn, while you are are mounted on your beast companion, squeezing does not cause you or your beast companion to take a -5 penalty to attack rolls, to grant combat advantage, or to move at half speed.

power.title: Feline Escape
power.fluff: You sidestep and attack as nimbly as your companion might
power.section: Prerequisite:You must have a cat beast companion.
Trigger:You are hit by an attack against AC or Reflex
Effect:You gain a +4 power bonus to AC and Reflex until the end of your next turn.
If the triggering attack misses you because of this bonus, you can shift a number of squares equal to 2 + one-half your Dexterity.

power.title: Ferret an Opening
power.fluff: With a keen eye, you leverage one moment of advantage to create another
power.section: Requirement:You must be flanking an enemy.
Effect:Choose one enemy you are currently flanking.
You have combat advantage against the chosen enemy until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Fox Shift
power.fluff: Distracted by your ally, your foe can't respond effective to your sly maneuvering
power.section: Trigger:You hit an enemy with a melee attack on your turn; the enemy must be marked by an ally
Effect:You shift 1 square.
Until the end of your next turn, you have a +2 power bonus to all defenses against attacks by the triggering enemy.

power.title: Hearten the Beast
power.fluff: With an encouraging shout, you give your beast companion the will to keep fighting
power.section: Effect:The target makes a saving throw to end an effect that a save can end.
Bear or Boar:Your beast companion gains a bonus to the saving throw equal to your [Strength or Wisdom] modifier.

power.title: Hunter's Privilege
power.fluff: Your keen senses and uncanny instincts give you an edge over your quarry
power.section: Prerequisite:You must have the Hunter's Quarry class feature.
Trigger:You roll initiative at the start of an encounter
Effect:You enter the Hunter's Privilege stance.
While you remain in the stance, the additional damage you deal against your quarry increases by 3.
Level 11:Increases by 4.
Level 21:Increases by 5.

power.title: Invigorating Stride
power.fluff: You back away from danger and catch your breath
power.section: Effect:You shift up to a number of squares equal to your [Strength or Wisdom] modifier. You must end this shift in a space that is not adjacent to any enemy.
If your second wind is available, you can add the Healing keyword to this power and use your second wind without spending an action.

power.title: Oak Skin
power.fluff: Your skin takes on the texture of tough bark, protecting you from the worst of your enemies' attacks
power.section: Effect:You gain resist all until the end of the encounter. The resist equals your [Strength or Wisdom] modifier.
Level 11:Equals 2 + your [Strength or Wisdom] modifier.
Level 21:Equals 4 + your [Strength or Wisdom] modifier.

power.title: Pack Alertness
power.fluff: Through subtle communications, you and your beast companion act almost as if you share senses

section.name: Target:
section.target: you, and your beast companion in the burst

power.section: Effect:Each target makes a Perception check and can use the higher result. If your beast companion becomes aware of a target, you do as well, and vice versa.
Cat, Raptor, or Wolf:Each target gains a +2 bonus to the Perception check.

power.title: Path of the Monkey
power.fluff: You and your companion take to the trees as if born there
power.section: Prerequisite:You must have a simian beast companion.
Effect:Until the end of the encounter or until your beast companion is killed or knocked unconscious, you gain the following benefits:
A climb speed equal to your land speed.
A +4 power bonus to Acrobatics checks.

power.title: Ranger's Agility
power.fluff: When you push yourself, you move with the speed and subtlety of the wind
power.section: Effect:Until the end of the encounter, you gain the following benefits:
+2 power bonus to speed.
When you shift, you can shift 1 additional square.

power.title: Reptilian Perseverance
power.fluff: With the tenacity of the plodding giant lizard, you ignore those who would push you back
power.section: Prerequisite:You must have a lizard beast companion.
Trigger:You or your beast companion is pushed, pulled, or slid

section.name: Target:
section.target: you, and your beast companion in the burst

power.section: Effect:Each target reduces the maximum distance of the triggering forced movement by a number of squares equal to your [Strength or Wisdom] modifier.

power.title: Safe Passage
power.fluff: The spirits of earth, stone, and land accept your plea for assistance, allowing your and your allies to move unhindered and at great speed

section.name: Target:
section.target: you and each ally in the burst

power.section: Effect:Until the end of the encounter, each target ignores difficult terrain and gains a +1 power bonus to speed.

power.title: Slither's Stride
power.fluff: You twist, contort, and scramble with surprising grace and speed to match your companion
power.section: Prerequisite:You must have a serpent beast companion.
Effect:Until the end of the encounter or until your beast companion is killed or is knocked unconscious, you and your beast companion gain the following benefits:
When either of you shifts, that character can shift 1 additional square.
Both of you ignore difficult terrain.

power.title: Stalker's Mist
power.fluff: A thick fog settles over the area, blocking sight and muffling sound - but only for your enemies
power.section: Effect:The burst creates a zone of mist until the end of the encounter.
Squares in the zone are heavily obscured to your enemies.
Move Action:You move the zone up to 5 squares.

power.title: Tenacity of the Tusked
power.fluff: You shake off a wound by channeling the savagery of your companion
power.section: Prerequisite:You must have a boar companion.
Trigger:You take damage from a melee attack
Effect:You reduce the triggering attack's damage by an amount equal to one-half your level + your [Strength or Wisdom] modifier.

If you reduce the triggering attack's damage to 0, you are not affected by any conditions or effects of the attack that happen on a hit. If the triggering attack was a miss, you are not affected by any conditions or effects from it instead.

power.title: Terrain Advantage
power.fluff: You use the terrain around you as your first line of defense
power.section: Effect:Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +4 power bonus to all defenses while you occupy a square of difficult terrain.

power.title: Unbalancing Parry
power.fluff: You deftly block your enemy's strike and turn its momentum against it, causing it to stumble
power.section: Trigger:An adjacent enemy misses you with a melee attack
Effect:You slide the target up to 3 squares to a space adjacent to you, and gain combat advantage against it until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Ursine Brutality
power.fluff: With a roar, you lunge forward, bullying your enemies backward
power.section: Prerequisite:You must have a bear beast companion.

Effect:Until the end of the encounter or until your beast companion is killed or knocked uncoscious, when you hit a creature with a melee attack, you can push that creature 1 square and shift 1 square into the space it vacated. If the creature is threatened by your beast companion, you can push it up to 2 squares instead.

power.title: Web Trick
power.fluff: Sticky webbing is a lifesaver in sticky situations
power.section: Prerequisite:You must have a spider beast companion.
Requirement:Your beast companion must be within 5 squares of you and able to make reactive strikes.
Trigger:You make an Athletics check to climb or because you took damage while climbing, or
You make a saving throw to avoid being forced into hindering terrain or over an edge
Effect:You gain a +4 power bonus to the triggering check or saving throw.
